content.raw:
It is very difficult to register a hover during a Drag and Drop operation. Technically my suggestion is to subclass the Palette QTreeView items (for example a draggable topic item) and to continuously receive the widget under the D&D cursor with `qApp->widgetAt(event->pos())`. If the received widget is a VariablePill as a result the layout of that pill will change to a highlighted color.

Before implementing these changes it would be nice to have a second opinion on this (reasonable approach, better solutions, some tips, etc.).

Thanks!
